Post-Match Reflections: Willie Green expressed pride in the team's effort despite the loss
Zion Williamson scored 29 points in the game
Jose Alvarado had a strong performance with 27 points and 7/7 three-point shooting
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cavaliers improved to a franchise-record 9-0 with the victory
The game was the Pelicans' third consecutive loss
The Pelicans will travel to Orlando for practice and face the Magic on Friday
Others: The Pelicans' next game is against the Magic on Friday
The Pelicans Podcast will feature a roundtable discussion with analysts
